content.raw:
I think I would vote to decline this in favour of having labconfig look for command line options/environment variables \(the main apps could accept command line options, but then they will need to set environment variables for child processes to inherit\) that modify which config file\(s\) to use more generally, that would work for all applications. It doesn’t seem super specific to lyse. So I would vote to close and reopen as a feature request.

If you agree then we could close this and reopen as a feature request.
